TEXT.TITLE: MEDCO CONTAINMENT <MCCS> SETS INITIAL PAYOUT
TEXT.BODY: Medco Containment Services Inc said its board declared an initial annual dividend of 10 cts per share, its first payout, payable March 19 to holders of record March 12. Reuter
